# Data Preparation

```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)

# ptaxPIN_data <- read_csv("./Output/Dont_Upload/0_joined_PIN_data_2022.csv")

muni_level <- read_csv("./Output/ptaxsim_muni_level_2006-2022.csv")

class_level <- read_csv("./Output/ptaxsim_muni_class_summaries_2006-2022.csv") %>% mutate(class = as.character(class))

class_dict <- read_csv("./Necessary_Files/class_dict_expanded.csv") %>% 
  mutate(class_code = as.character(class_code))

source("helper_tc_muninames_2022.R")
```

```{r}
class_level <- class_level %>% left_join(class_dict, by = c("class" = "class_code"))
class_level
```
